title: Inclusive Educational Technology Utilization Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Inclusive educational technology course operating in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment, where some learners may have disabilities or learning variances

learning_goals: Learners can utilize three or more inclusive educational tools considering diverse learner needs
Learners can apply smartphone-based assistive technologies (e.g., screen readers, captioning tools) to instructional design
Learners can develop inclusive education plans reflecting the Indian legal framework (such as the Rights of Persons with Disabilities Act 2016)

resources: Simplified Accessibility Checker Tools (e.g., Web Accessibility Inspectors)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
